data.title: Current Endowed Scholarships
data.meta_description: Thanks to the generosity of donors, Harding offers hundreds of endowed scholarships each year to help students receive a world-class Christian education.
data.text:
C. FLOYD DANIEL ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Mr. and Mrs. David Lunceford in honor of C. Floyd Daniel.

JIM DANIEL - TITANS ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established in honor of Jim Daniel, longtime sponsor for the Titans social club by former club members and friends.

TINA BEAVERS DANIEL LEADERSHIP SCHOLARSHIP: Established in honor of Tina Beavers Daniel by the Arkansas Real Estate Foundation.

RONALD and PHYLLIS DASHER ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Phyllis Dasher.

KENNETH DAVIS JR. ENDOWMENT: Established by friends and colleagues in honor of Dr. Kenneth Davis, Jr., the long-time director of the A Cappella Chorus and chairman of the Department of Music.

LELA DAVIS MEMORIAL PRESIDENT'S ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Yvonne James to honor her mother, Lela Davis.

SETH DECKER MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by the class of 1997 members from the Marriage and Family Therapy Program in memory of Seth Decker.

VICKI DELL MEMORIAL MUSIC SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Dr. Erle T. and Mona Moore.

LANDON THOMAS DENNEY ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Richard and Cynthia G. Denney in memory of their son, Landon Thomas Denney.

RAY DICKSON SCHOLARSHIP: Established in honor of Ray Dickson by Walter Vollrath, Jr.

DIVERSITY IN EDUCATION ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by the Cannon-Clary College of Education Committee, joined by the Dean of the College of Education and Harding University.

PHIL DIXON and RANDALL CASELMAN ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Elsie Jett in honor of Phil Dixon and Randall Caselman.

RUDOLPH and BERNIECE DIXON ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established in honor and memory of Rudolph Dixon and Berniece Stroud Dixon by their sons, Lynn and Philip Dixon.

CARLYLE DOCKERY MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Nell and Randall Owen in memory of C. C. Dockery.

ROBERT L. and NANNALEE DOLLINS MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Rod and Susan Dollins in honor the memory of Rod’s parents, Robert L. and Nannalee Dollins.

GENE DUGGER ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP FOR MATH & SCIENCES: Established by Frances Dugger in memory of her husband, Gene Dugger.

ALBERT C. DUKE MEMORIAL ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Jacob Duke in honor of the life of Albert C. Duke.

VICTOR DURRINGTON ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Val Durrington, Vance Durrington and Vearl Durrington in memory of their father, Victor Durrington.

J. L., GERTRUDE, LATINA, and NORMAN DYKES PRESIDENT'S ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Latina Dykes in honor of the Dykes family.

BRIAN A. SANDERS MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Mrs. Violet Sanders in memory of her son, Brian.

L. O. SANDERSON MUSIC SCHOLARSHIP: Established in honor of L. O. Sanderson.

WALTER C. SANDERSON ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP FUND: Established by Walter C. Sanderson.

SCHAEFER FAMILY SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Greg and Carrie Schaefer.

STANLEY S. SCHWARTZ, M.D. ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Lois Jeanette Robertson Schwartz in memory of Stanley S. Schwartz, M.D.

SCM ARCHITECTS ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by SCM Architects.

GLADYS SETLIFF CHANCELLOR'S ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established in memory of Gladys Setliff Chancellor, by Mark & Susan Wallis and Levon & Gail Deputy.

ANN RICHMOND SEWELL and EDWARD G. SEWELL ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Mrs. Edith H. Richmond in honor of Ann Richmond Sewell and Edward Sewell.

SHACKELFORD INTERNATIONAL PROGRAMS ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Robbie Shackelford et al.

ROBERT ELMER and IONA LENORE SHACKELFORD BIBLE SCHOLARSHIP: Established in memory of Robert Elmer and Iona Lenore Shackelford by their son, Dr. Don Shackelford.

ARTHUR L. SHEARIN ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Arthur L. and Sheri Tipps Shearin.

ARTHUR L. and SHERI T. SHEARIN VOCAL MUSIC ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Arthur L. and Sheri T. Shearin.

HERBERT R. and KATHERINE A. SHERROW JR. ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Herbert R. and Katherine A. Sherrow.

SHEWMAKER MISSIONARY CHILDREN'S SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Mr. and Mrs. J. C. Shewmaker.

DEWEY SHIRLEY SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Dortha Putman Shirley in memory of Mr. Dewey Shirley.

MR. and MRS. FORREST SHMIDL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Mr. and Mrs. Forrest Shmidl.

DR. CATHLEEN SHULTZ SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Dr. Sam L. Shultz in honor of his wife, Dr. Cathleen Shultz.

PEGGY HALTOM SHUMATE MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Hugh Wagnon and Jeannine Wagnon in memory of Peggy Haltom Shumate.

MARTHA RUTH SIMMONS FUND FOR NURSING: Established by John O. Simmons, Betty Ann Simmons Robison, Mary Lee Simmons Spivey and Patsy Ruth Simmons Ellis in honor of Martha Ruth Simmons.

RUSSELL L. and MYRTLE SIMMONS MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Mrs. Russell L. Simmons, friends and associates in memory of Russell L. Simmons.

CARROLL and SARAH SITES MINISTER AND MISSIONS SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Jimmy and Amanda Sites in honor of his parents, Carroll and Sarah Sites.

BOGAN and CAROLYN SMITH PRESIDENT’S ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Bogan and Carolyn Smith.

GAYLON and DEANNA SMITH ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Keith Smith and Craig Smith to honor their parents, Gaylon and Deanna Smith.

JIMMY and DONNA SMITH ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Donna Smith and her son, Steve Smith in honor and memory of Jimmy Smith.

NICHOLAS SMITH MEMORIAL ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Richard, Amy and Alexis Smith in memory of Nicholas Smith.

SMITTY ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP FUND FOR THEATRE: Established by Patricia Smith in honor of her father, C. G. (Smitty) Smith.

RALPH and JANE SMOOT SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Ralph and Jane Smoot.

STEPHEN W. SMOOT MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Mr. and Mrs. Ralph Smoot in memory of Stephen W. Smoot.

SOUTH BROADWAY CHURCH of CHRIST: Established by the South Broadway Church of Christ, Poteau, Oklahoma.

SOUTH CAROLINA BIBLE SCHOLARSHIP: Established by anonymous donors.

SOUTH CAROLINA MIDLANDS SCHOLARSHIP: Established by anonymous donors.

SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Michael and Rita Osbourne.

SUZANNE F. SPURRIER LIBRARY SPECIAL PROJECTS ENDOWMENT: Established by Suzanne Spurrier.

DON and MARIAN STARKS PRESIDENT'S ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Marian Starks, Paul and Suzanne Starks, John and Patricia Eastland, and Walter and Valerie Starks in honor of Don and Marian Starks.

G. ERWIN and MAUD ANSEL STAUFFER SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Maude Ansel Stauffer.

JAMES A. and HELEN INEZ CARTER STEELMAN ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Helen Inez Carter Steelman.

STEPHENS CENTER FOR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT: Established by Jack Stephens.

ALVIN O. STEVENS MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Colleen S. Miller in memory of Alvin O. Stevens.

BILL and KAREN STOKES SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Bill and Karen Stokes.

WILLIAM E. SR. and ALICE JO STOKES ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by family and friends of William E. Sr. and Alice Jo Stokes.

MARK STORY ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Rayanne Story in memory of her husband, Mark Story.

LEROY STRAIN BIBLE MAJOR ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Leroy Strain.

EVERT STROUD and LOUISE STROUD TUCKER NURSING SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Louise Stroud Tucker.

COLLEGE OF PHARMACY STUDENT SOCIETY OF HEALTH-SYSTEM PHARMACY: Established by the Student Society of Health System Pharmacy.

H. J. and MARY FLORA SUDBURY MEMORIAL WORLD EVANGELISM SCHOLARSHIP: Established by H. J. Sudbury and his sons in memory of his wife, Mary Flora Sudbury.

SUMMITT FAMILY ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Paul Clayton Summitt to honor his parents, William Knox and Maurine Burch Summitt.

SUN VALLEY CHURCH OF CHRIST SCHOLARSHIP: Established by the Sun Valley Church of Christ in Houston, Texas.

JENNILLE CHALENBURG SUTTON SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Jennille Chalenburg Sutton.

JOSEPH H. and JENNILLE CHALENBURG SUTTON MEMORIAL SCHOLARSHIP: Established by Jennille Chalenburg Sutton.
